description: (Used car) No repairs, accidents, or repainting.

examples.chinese: 全车原版原漆,无事故现在9万多开走
examples.translation: Whole car original paint, no accidents, drive away with 90k+

examples.chinese: 卖车,2020款,2020年1月上牌,原版原漆
examples.translation: Selling car, 2020 model, Jan 2020 registered, original paint

examples.chinese: 4.3万公里实表原车轮胎,原版原漆,个人一手车
examples.translation: 43k km real mileage, original tires, original paint, one owner
